trans-unit.source: Defines several XPath functions and namespace mappings commonly used when evaluating XPath expressions against SOAP documents.
trans-unit.target: 定義數個在對 SOAP 文件評估 XPath 運算式時常用的 XPath 函式和命名空間對應。

trans-unit.source: The XPath engine has full XPath context support and uses the .NET Framework's <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext> class in the same way that <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> does to implement this support.
trans-unit.target: XPath 引擎提供完整的 XPath 內容支援，並且和 <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext> 一樣，會使用 .NET Framework 的 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 類別來實作這項支援。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext> is an abstract class that allows developers to implement custom XPath function libraries and declare XPath variables.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext> 是一個抽象類別，開發人員可以用來實作自訂 XPath 函式程式庫和宣告 XPath 變數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext> is an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> and thus also contains the namespace prefix mappings.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext> 是 <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>，因此也會包含命名空間前置詞對應。

trans-unit.source: The filter engine implements an <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext> named <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext>.
trans-unit.target: 篩選引擎會實作名為 <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext> 的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext> defines custom functions that can be used in XPath expressions and it declares several common namespace prefix mappings.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext> 會定義可在 XPath 運算式中使用的自訂函式，並且會宣告數個通用的命名空間前置詞對應。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the custom functions defined by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext> that can be used in XPath expressions.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出所定義的自訂函式<xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext>可用 XPath 運算式中。

trans-unit.source: XPath Function
trans-unit.target: XPath 函式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: body
trans-unit.target: body

trans-unit.source: Returns the SOAP Body node, regardless of SOAP version (1.1.
trans-unit.target: 傳回在 SOAP Body 節點，不論 SOAP 版本 (1.1。

trans-unit.source: header
trans-unit.target: 標頭

trans-unit.source: Returns the SOAP Header node, regardless of SOAP version (1.1 or 1.2).
trans-unit.target: 傳回的 SOAP 標頭的節點，不論 （1.1 或 1.2） 的 SOAP 版本。

trans-unit.source: correlation-data
trans-unit.target: correlation-data

trans-unit.source: Takes an input string and returns the value of the associated correlation message property.
trans-unit.target: 接受輸入的字串並傳回相關聯的相互關聯訊息屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: 'wsc-instanceId' is a reserved string used for context-based correlation.
trans-unit.target: ' wsc instanceId' 是保留的字串，用於以內容為主的相互關聯。

trans-unit.source: messageId
trans-unit.target: messageId

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the WS-Addressing MessageID header.
trans-unit.target: 傳回與 Ws-addressing MessageID 標頭的值。

trans-unit.source: relatesTo
trans-unit.target: relatesTo

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the WS-Addressing RelatesTo header, regardless of version (August2004 or WSA 1.0).
trans-unit.target: 傳回與 Ws-addressing RelatesTo 標頭，不限於任何版本 （August2004 或 WSA 1.0） 的值。

trans-unit.source: replyTo
trans-unit.target: replyTo

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the WS-Addressing ReplyTo header, regardless of version (August2004 or WSA 1.0).
trans-unit.target: 傳回 Ws-addressing ReplyTo 標頭，不限於任何版本 （August2004 或 WSA 1.0） 的值。

trans-unit.source: from
trans-unit.target: 由

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the WS-Addressing From header, regardless of version (August2004 or WSA 1.0).
trans-unit.target: 傳回從 WS 定址標頭的值，不限於任何版本 （August2004 或 WSA 1.0）。

trans-unit.source: faultTo
trans-unit.target: faultTo

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the WS-Addressing FaultTo header, regardless of version (August2004 or WSA 1.0).
trans-unit.target: 傳回與 Ws-addressing FaultTo 標頭，不限於任何版本 （August2004 或 WSA 1.0） 的值。

trans-unit.source: to
trans-unit.target: 設為

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the WS-Addressing To header if present, else it returns Anonymous.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值的 WS 定址標頭的如果有的話，否則它會傳回匿名。

trans-unit.source: action
trans-unit.target: action

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the WS-Addressing Action header.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的 Ws-addressing 動作標頭的值。

trans-unit.source: soap-uri
trans-unit.target: soap-uri

trans-unit.source: Returns the SOAP namespace uri.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的 SOAP 命名空間 uri。

trans-unit.source: headers-with-actor
trans-unit.target: headers-with-actor

trans-unit.source: Takes a SOAP Actor uri and returns all headers that contain that actor, regardless of SOAP version (1.1 or 1.2).
trans-unit.target: 接受的 SOAP 動作項目 uri 會傳回含有該動作項目，不論 （1.1 或 1.2） 的 SOAP 版本的所有標頭。

trans-unit.source: actor
trans-unit.target: 動作項目

trans-unit.source: Returns the SOAP Actor uri of the first child node, regardless of SOAP version (1.1 or 1.2).
trans-unit.target: 傳回的 SOAP 動作項目 uri 的第一個子節點，不論 （1.1 或 1.2） 的 SOAP 版本。

trans-unit.source: is-mandatory
trans-unit.target: is-mandatory

trans-unit.source: Returns whether or not the first child node is mandatory, regardless of SOAP version (1.1 or 1.2).
trans-unit.target: 傳回第一個子節點為強制性，不論 （1.1 或 1.2） 的 SOAP 版本。

trans-unit.source: is-actor-next
trans-unit.target: is-actor-next

trans-unit.source: Returns whether or not the SOAP Actor uri of the first child node assumes the Next role, regardless of SOAP version (1.1 or 1.2).
trans-unit.target: 傳回第一個子節點的 SOAP 動作項目 uri 擔任下一步 角色，無論 （1.1 或 1.2） 的 SOAP 版本。

trans-unit.source: is-actor-ultimate-receiver
trans-unit.target: is-actor-ultimate-receiver

trans-unit.source: Returns whether or not the SOAP Actor uri of the first child node assumes the UltimateReceiver role, regardless of SOAP version (1.1 or 1.2).
trans-unit.target: 傳回第一個子節點的 SOAP 動作項目 uri 擔任 UltimateReceiver 角色，無論 （1.1 或 1.2） 的 SOAP 版本。

trans-unit.source: date-time
trans-unit.target: 日期時間

trans-unit.source: Takes an input date string and returns the value converted to a double.
trans-unit.target: 接受輸入的日期字串並傳回轉換成雙精度浮點數的值。

trans-unit.source: duration
trans-unit.target: 持續期間

trans-unit.source: Takes an input timespan string and returns the value as a total number of days.
trans-unit.target: 接受輸入的 timespan 字串，並傳回值為總天數。

trans-unit.source: utc-now
trans-unit.target: utc-now

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of <xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的值<xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the default namespaces and namespace prefixes that are declared by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext>.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出所宣告的預設命名空間和命名空間前置詞<xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext>。

trans-unit.source: Prefix
trans-unit.target: 前置詞

trans-unit.source: Namespace
trans-unit.target: 命名空間

trans-unit.source: wsaAugust2004
trans-unit.target: wsaAugust2004

trans-unit.source: wsa10
trans-unit.target: wsa10

trans-unit.source: sm
trans-unit.target: /sm

trans-unit.source: tempuri
trans-unit.target: tempuri

trans-unit.source: ser
trans-unit.target: ser

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext" /> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext" /> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.NameTable" /> class used internally to store strings.
trans-unit.target: 在內部用於儲存字串的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.NameTable" /> 類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.NameTable" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.NameTable" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Several classes including this one, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, and <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> use the <xref:System.Xml.NameTable> class internally to store attribute and element names.
trans-unit.target: 許多類別 (包括這個 <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> 類別) 和 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> 會在內部使用 <xref:System.Xml.NameTable> 類別，以儲存屬性和項目名稱。

trans-unit.source: When an element or attribute name occurs multiple times in an XML document, it is stored only once in the <xref:System.Xml.NameTable>.
trans-unit.target: 當項目或屬性名稱在 XML 文件中出現多次時，它只會在 <xref:System.Xml.NameTable> 中儲存一次。

trans-unit.source: The names are stored as common language runtime (CLR) object types.
trans-unit.target: 這些名稱會儲存為 Common Language Runtime (CLR) 物件型別。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to do object comparisons on these strings rather than a more expensive string comparison.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您對這些字串進行物件比較，而不需要更耗費資源的字串比較。

trans-unit.source: The base URI of the first document to compare.
trans-unit.target: 第一份要比較之文件的基底 URI。

trans-unit.source: The base URI of the second document to compare.
trans-unit.target: 第二份要比較之文件的基底 URI。

trans-unit.source: Compares the base Uniform Resource Identifiers (URIs) of two documents based upon the order the documents were loaded by the XSLT processor.
trans-unit.target: 根據 XSLT 處理器載入兩個文件的順序，比較它們的基底統一資源識別元 (URI)。

trans-unit.source: Always returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 一律傳回 0。

trans-unit.source: This property should be overridden in a derived class in order to be used.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性應該在衍生類別中覆寫，才能加以使用。

trans-unit.source: The white space node that is to be preserved or stripped in the current context.
trans-unit.target: 目前內容中要保留或刪除的空白區節點。

trans-unit.source: Evaluates whether to preserve white space nodes or strip them for the given context.
trans-unit.target: 評估指定的內容是否要保留或刪除空白區節點。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 一律傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property should be overridden in a derived class in order to be used.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性應該在衍生類別中覆寫，才能加以使用。

trans-unit.source: The prefix of the function as it appears in the XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: 函式出現在 XPath 運算式時所具有的前置詞。

trans-unit.source: The name of the function.
trans-unit.target: 函式的名稱。

trans-unit.source: An array of argument types for the function being resolved.
trans-unit.target: 要加以解析之函式的引數型別陣列。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to select between methods with the same name (for example, overloaded methods).
trans-unit.target: 這讓您可以選取具有相同名稱的方法 (例如，多載方法)。

trans-unit.source: Resolves a function reference and returns an [T:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextFunction](ms-help://MS.MSSDK.1033/MS.WinFXSDK.1033/cpref37/html/T_System_Xml_Xsl_IXsltContextFunction.htm) that represents the function.
trans-unit.target: 解析函式參考並傳回表示該函式的 [T:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextFunction](ms-help://MS.MSSDK.1033/MS.WinFXSDK.1033/cpref37/html/T_System_Xml_Xsl_IXsltContextFunction.htm)。

trans-unit.source: An [T:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextFunction](ms-help://MS.MSSDK.1033/MS.WinFXSDK.1033/cpref37/html/T_System_Xml_Xsl_IXsltContextFunction.htm) that represents the function.
trans-unit.target: 表示函式的 [T:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextFunction](ms-help://MS.MSSDK.1033/MS.WinFXSDK.1033/cpref37/html/T_System_Xml_Xsl_IXsltContextFunction.htm)。

trans-unit.source: The [T:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextFunction](ms-help://MS.MSSDK.1033/MS.WinFXSDK.1033/cpref37/html/T_System_Xml_Xsl_IXsltContextFunction.htm) is used at execution time to evaluate the function.
trans-unit.target: [T:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextFunction](ms-help://MS.MSSDK.1033/MS.WinFXSDK.1033/cpref37/html/T_System_Xml_Xsl_IXsltContextFunction.htm)在執行時間用來評估此函數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="argTypes" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="argTypes" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The prefix of the variable as it appears in the XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: 變數出現在 XPath 運算式時所具有的前置詞。

trans-unit.source: The name of the variable.
trans-unit.target: 變數的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Resolves a variable reference and returns an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextVariable" /> that represents the variable.
trans-unit.target: 解析變數參考並傳回表示變數的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextVariable" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextVariable" /> that represents the variable at runtime.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextVariable" />，表示在執行階段的變數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextVariable> is used at execution time to get the value of the variable.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextVariable> 會在執行時間用來取得變數的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether to include white space nodes in the output.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值會指出是否要在輸出中包含空白區 (White Space) 節點。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 一律傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property should be overridden in a derived class in order to be used.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性應該在衍生類別中覆寫，才能加以使用。
